text: it 's animals . in the snow . need we say more ? from cats to cows , puppies to camels , check out animals enjoying the winter weather . have your own snowy pet photos to share ? submit at cnn ireport , and they could be added to the gallery .
summary: see cats , dogs , camels and birds enjoying the winter weather .   submit your own wintry animal photos at cnn ireport .   also check out our gallery of beautiful ice formations .
